game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Relic
game.objective: Uncover the relic's hidden powers and restore peace
game.description: A century-old legend speaks of a mystical artifact that rests within the forgotten city. Your mission is to locate and unravel its mysteries, for it holds the key to restoring balance in our realm.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a mystic amulet

task.objective: Discover the map of the hidden city
task.description: In the local library, seek out ancient maps hinting at the location of the ruins. Follow the cryptic clues to guide you.

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the city's guardians
task.description: The guardians of the ancient city guard its secrets. Solve their puzzle to gain entry and continue your quest.

task.objective: Battle the guardian in the temple chamber
task.description: The artifact's resting place is guarded by an ancient guardian. Your skills will be tested as you defeat her to claim the relic.
